title: "Rmarkdown and Leaflet Example"
date: January 12, 2018
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(leaflet); library(dplyr)
```

# Golden Gate Bridge Map

```{r}
my_map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles()

sfSite <- c("<a href= 'http://www.goldengatebridge.org/'>Golden Gate Bridge Home Page</a>")

sf_map <- my_map %>% 
  addMarkers(lat=37.8199, lng=-122.4783, popup=sfSite)
sf_map

```
